name: Mike Colling & Co.
description:
Our job as a performance agency is to understand brands; to ﬁnd, target and then recruit a brand’s customers. This simple principle underpins our approach and is the key to our successful strategy delivering growth for our clients.
As a well-established and trusted independent performance agency, we use data and our business understanding to connect with our clients'​ brands; learning who they want to target, and then finding and converting those people as efficiently as possible to loyal, long standing customers. We are a multi-skilled team of strategists, planners, buyers and analysts, but we prefer to call ourselves ‘Brand Drivers’. It’s much less of mouthful, sums us up succinctly and sounds much better! Because brand driving is basically what we do - making sure that every piece of media we produce drives your brand forward - ensuring every touch point with a potential customer drives sales and growth.
